title: Provide the full website source code structure (frontend + backend) with developer documentation and required static assets

requirements.text: Add a root-level developer documentation file that clearly explains where the frontend and backend source code lives in this project, highlights the main entry files, and documents how to run the app locally and how to deploy it on the Internet Computer.

quotes: give me code of  the website like front end and backends

acceptanceCriteria: A new root documentation file exists (e.g., README.md) that explicitly points to backend/main.mo as the backend entry point and frontend/src/App.tsx as the frontend app entry point.

Documentation includes local development steps for the frontend (install dependencies, run dev server) and for the IC canister (dfx start/deploy workflow), referencing the existing frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT.md where appropriate.
Documentation is written in English and includes a brief high-level directory tree (frontend vs backend) so a user can locate code quickly.

requirements.text: Ensure the SEO/static images referenced by the frontend exist as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames already referenced in the codebase.

quotes: give me code of  the website like front end and backends

acceptanceCriteria: The files /assets/generated/ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg and /assets/generated/car-showroom-hero.dim_1200x600.jpg exist in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The app loads without broken image links where /assets/generated/ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg is used (e.g., in frontend/src/components/LoginForm.tsx and frontend/index.html).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; do not introduce additional backend services.

Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything inside frontend/src/components/ui (compose instead).
User-facing text added/modified by this request must be in English.
nonGoals: Adding new product features beyond documentation and ensuring referenced static assets exist.
Implementing third-party auth providers other than Internet Identity.
Adding external databases or non-Motoko backend services.

required: Wide hero banner illustration of a modern car showroom with subtle ML/data overlay (car-showroom-hero.dim_1200x600.jpg)
Social share preview image with a car silhouette and abstract chart/ML motifs (ml-car-prediction.dim_800x400.jpg)
